definitions.definition: A small explosive device, typically containing a small amount of gunpowder in a tightly-wound roll of paper, primarily designed to produce a large bang.
A peanut butter cracker baked with marijuana , similar in concept to an Alice B. Toklas brownie .
An individual who is quick-tempered , rambunctious , or unpredictable .

main_definition: A small explosive device, typically containing a small amount of gunpowder in a tightly-wound roll of paper, primarily designed to produce a large bang.
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) A peanut butter cracker baked with marijuana , similar in concept to an Alice B. Toklas brownie .
( slang ) An individual who is quick-tempered , rambunctious , or unpredictable .
